item.title: Easter Quest [Mini]
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“legacy508, post:1, topic:334503”]You must have the knowlage of servers to complete this you’reself. I havent added this isnto my server i coded it on notepade and i have not finished it myself.

Old-Rs Easter Event!

NPC’s :

Easter Bunny
Rats
Goblins

Area’s :

-Lumbridge
-Falador
-Edge Dungeon

Start of quest :

Dialog :

if(NPCID == Easter Bunny ID){ NpcDialogue = Dialoge ID; NpcDialogueSend = false; } }

[CODE]case Dialoge ID:
c.talk("", “Would you like to help me and save easter?”, “”, 376);
break;

case Dialoge ID:
c.choice("", “What’s the problem.?”, “Maybe Later.”);
break;

case Dialoge ID:
c.talk2("", “The Rats and Goblens have teamed up against us. They stole our eggs. we need them back!”, “”, 376);
break;

case Dialoge ID:
c.talk3("", “Bring me back 10 eggs, Goodluck.”, “”, 376);
break;

case Dialoge ID:
c.playerTalk("", “Thanks!”, “”, “”);
break;

case Dialoge ID:
if(c.HasItemAmount(1961, 10)){
c.talk("", “Oh Thanks for the eggs, Here is a Easter Ring!”, “”, 376);
deleteItem(1961, 10);
addItem(7927, 1);
addItem(995, 100000);
break;[/CODE]

Npcdrops.cfg

//easterquest npcdrop = 100 1961 1 100 npcdrop = 87 1961 1 100

Idk if it works never really tested it. Just a miniquest[/quote]

…

You made a whole tutorial, you didn’t add the Bunny Id… and you said “Idk if it works never really tested it.”…
Perhaps you should test is before you released it, and you don’t explain anything about where and how to add any of the codes, you just gave us a bunch of code and basically said good luck… You need to re-do your whole tutorial.

Read full topic

item.title: Easter Quest [Mini]
item.dc:creator: @legacy508 legacy508
item.description:
@legacy508 wrote:

You must have the knowlage of servers to complete this you’reself. I havent added this isnto my server i coded it on notepade and i have not finished it myself.

Old-Rs Easter Event!

NPC’s :

Easter Bunny
Rats
Goblins

Area’s :

-Lumbridge
-Falador
-Edge Dungeon

Start of quest :

Dialog :

if(NPCID == Easter Bunny ID){ NpcDialogue = Dialoge ID; NpcDialogueSend = false; } }

[CODE]case Dialoge ID:
c.talk("", “Would you like to help me and save easter?”, “”, 376);
break;

case Dialoge ID:
c.choice("", “What’s the problem.?”, “Maybe Later.”);
break;

case Dialoge ID:
c.talk2("", “The Rats and Goblens have teamed up against us. They stole our eggs. we need them back!”, “”, 376);
break;

case Dialoge ID:
c.talk3("", “Bring me back 10 eggs, Goodluck.”, “”, 376);
break;

case Dialoge ID:
c.playerTalk("", “Thanks!”, “”, “”);
break;

case Dialoge ID:
if(c.HasItemAmount(1961, 10)){
c.talk("", “Oh Thanks for the eggs, Here is a Easter Ring!”, “”, 376);
deleteItem(1961, 10);
addItem(7927, 1);
addItem(995, 100000);
break;[/CODE]

Npcdrops.cfg

//easterquest npcdrop = 100 1961 1 100 npcdrop = 87 1961 1 100

Idk if it works never really tested it. Just a miniquest
